{ import(Comments, './comments') }

{ for (index, comment, comments) }
<div class="comment" data-index="{ index }">
  <div class="name">{ comment['name'] }, <span class="date">{ comment['date'] }</span></div>
  <div class="message">{ comment['message'] }</div>
  <div class="childs">
    <Comments comments={ comment['childs'] } />
  </div>
</div>
{ endfor }
